description: The Windows SmartScreen Bypass Mitigation Tool is designed to help users resolve a security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2023-36025) that affects Windows systems. The tool assists in ensuring that the SmartScreen feature operates as intended, providing robust protection against potential exploit attempts. By utilizing this tool, administrators can confirm proper configurations and apply necessary updates to mitigate security risks associated with the bypass vulnerability. Detailed documentation on utilizing the tool includes settings adjustments and verification steps to enhance system security. Regular updates and monitoring provided through the tool ensure that systems remain secure against evolving threats in online environments.
